EmailTemplate.description: Send to contractors that don't meet criteria or that request info emailed.
EmailTemplate.name: Tyvek® Follow the Vinyl
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Tyvek® ThermaWrap™ R5.0
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for your interest in DuPont™ Tyvek® ThermaWrap™ R5.0. We have an extensive North American network of construction specialists trained to help with specifications, installation questions, and on-site consultation/training.
Unique to the construction industry, a DuPont certified Tyvek® specialist can assist with questions relating to water intrusion problems, proper flashing techniques, or customizing a sales or marketing program.
Please click here for the First Time Buyers Program information.
Please contact your regional Tyvek® Specialist:
*****INSERT TYVEK SPECIALIST NAME, EMAIL AND PHONE****
Sincerely,
{!Lead.LastModifiedBy} DuPont Building Innovations 1-800-448-9835
